text: Of every kind of bird, of every kind of animal, and of every kind of thing that crawls on the ground, two of each will come to you, that you may keep them alive.

VI. Final Recommendation and Warning - O Timothy, guard what has been entrusted to you. Avoid profane babbling and the absurdities of so-called knowledge.
